parameters.name: Accessibility
parameters.description:
The accessibility. Valid values:

*   PUBLIC: All members in the workspace can access the workspace.
*   PRIVATE: Only the creator can access the workspace.

parameters.name: Creator
parameters.description: The UID of the Alibaba Cloud account that is used to create the workspace.

parameters.name: Option
parameters.description:
The configuration. Separate multiple configurations with commas (,). Valid values:

*   ResourceEmpty: The Resource parameter is not configured.
*   DisableRam: The RAM check is not performed.

parameters.name: PermissionCode
parameters.description: The permission name, which is unique in a region. For more information about permissions, see [Appendix: Roles and permissions](~~2840449~~). For more information about how to obtain the permission name, see [ListPermissions](~~449132~~).

parameters.name: WorkspaceId
parameters.description: The workspace ID. You can call [ListWorkspaces](~~449124~~) to obtain the workspace ID.
